achievements.title: Inception
achievements.description: Move a file into a file

achievements.title: The Name Game
achievements.description: Attempt to rename a file the same name as another file

achievements.title: Oops! All Folders
achievements.description: Have a folder with 20 or more folders in it & no files

achievements.title: The Parent Trap
achievements.description: Move a folder into its own child

achievements.title: The Mass Deleter
achievements.description: Delete 5 or more files at once

achievements.title: The Great Expander
achievements.description: Expand a folder in the sidebar

achievements.title: The Navigator
achievements.description: Navigate to a folder 3 levels deep
